item.title: I tell the FBI that I want to help them understand one of the biggest frauds in history, the frauds committed by McDonald’s Corporation and their accomplices
item.description: Click on this link to visualize the original email: 2023-02-07_1334_0800_fbi_I_want_to_help_you_Redacted.pdf From: Vincent B. Le Corre Subject: Mr. Rogalski, I want to help you understand one of the biggest fraud in history Date sent: February 7, 2023 at 13:34 +0800 (China Standard Time) To: Adam Rogalski (Legal Attaché/State Department) Cc: Edward Lehman Note: since Assistant Legal Attaché Adam Rogalski told me on 2021-09-20 that he was “one of the FBI representatives,” I assume that this communication was transferred to the Federal Bureau of Investigation (FBI).

item.title: Unmasking McDonald’s: The Lance Armstrong of Fast Food
item.description: Click on this link to visualize the original email: 2023-01-30_2007_0800_FBI_LANCE_ARMSTRONG.pdf From: Vincent B. Le Corre Subject: [OFF THE RECORD FOR NOW] LANCE ARMSTRONG Date sent: January 30, 2023, 20:07 +0800 (China Standard Time) To: Adam Rogalski (Legal Attaché/State Department), Federal Bureau of Investigation (FBI) Cc: Edward Lehman Note: since Assistant Legal Attaché Adam Rogalski told me on 2021-09-20 that he was “one of the FBI representatives,” I assume that this communication was transferred to the Federal Bureau of Investigation (FBI).

item.title: 2-page Statement of Facts in the McDonald’s RICO/PORA/FCPA case sent to Edward Lehman
item.description: Click on this link to visualize the original document: 2-page_statement-of-facts_mcdonalds_rico_pora_fcpa_case_Redacted.pdf Statement of Facts - selected events | Memorandum n°2-2022-10-24_2_pages_only | Date: October 24, 2022 To: Edward LEHMAN (contact email: [REDACTED]) From: Vincent B. Le Corre (contact email: [REDACTED] phone +86-[REDACTED]) Subject: RICO, FCPA, pattern of racketeering activity by McDonald’s Corporation and its subsidiary companies Summary: McDonald’s Corporation and its subsidiary companies have engaged, for years, in a pattern of racketeering activity, money laundering, and corruption of at least one French official.
